item.title: Democracy Experts Scorned by Trump Are Plotting to Sabotage Democracy
item.description: Based on the reporting by NOTUS , they don’t seem to see anything wrong with this.

item.title: Don’t Blame DOGE for Texas Flood Tragedy
item.description: During an extreme weather event, irresponsible actors rushed to point the finger at Donald Trump and Elon Musk for the terrible death toll.

item.title: Trump Could See a Short-Lived Win on the Alien Enemies Act
item.description: The president’s AEA invocation is surely headed to the Supreme Court yet again.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Aren’t the Crazed Haters Depicted by the Media
item.description: When the anger scatters, there’s real human concern and compassion.

item.title: Louisiana’s Declaration of Energy Independence
item.description: The new state law shifting focus to producing domestic fuel, not energy that relies on foreign countries, provides a model for other states to follow.
